scripts.build:css: echo '=> build:css' && node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed -o public/css/ assets/css/
scripts.build:js: echo '=> build:js' && browserify assets/js/main.js --debug -t [ babelify ] | exorcist public/js/main.js.map > public/js/main.js && browserify assets/js/dep.js --debug -t [ babelify ] | exorcist public/js/dep.js.map > public/js/dep.js
scripts.postbuild:js: uglifyjs public/js/main.js -c -m -o public/js/main.min.js && uglifyjs public/js/dep.js -c -m -o public/js/dep.min.js
scripts.watch:js: parallelshell "watchify assets/js/main.js --debug --verbose -t [ babelify ] -o 'exorcist public/js/main.js.map > public/js/main.js'" "watchify assets/js/dep.js --debug --verbose -t [ babelify ] -o 'exorcist public/js/dep.js.map > public/js/dep.js'"
scripts.build:tag: echo '=> build:tag' && riot --template pug --style scss assets/templates/ public/js/tag.build.js && babel public/js/tag.build.js --compact false -o public/js/tag.js && uglifyjs public/js/tag.js -c -m -o public/js/tag.min.js && rm -f public/js/tag.build.js
scripts.watch:tag: touch public/js/tag.build.js && parallelshell "riot --template pug --style scss --watch assets/templates/ public/js/tag.build.js" "babel public/js/tag.build.js --compact false --watch -o public/js/tag.js"
scripts.build: echo '=> building...' && npm run build:tag -s && npm run build:css -s && npm run build:js -s
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:tag -s' 'npm run watch:css -s' 'npm run watch:js -s'
